content: Hello! Welcome back to BPI! How can I assist you today?

suggestions.suggestion: Hello! Welcome back to BPI! How can I assist you today?

content: paano maginvest sa iabng product ng BPI

Para sa iyong investment journey sa BPI, simulan mo sa BPI Savings Account na may Passbook o ATM. Ayon sa latest requirements, kailangan mo ng initial deposit na P500 at maintaining balance na P3,000. Kapag na-maintain mo ito, automatic kang kikita ng interest na 0.0625% p.a. na binabayaran quarterly. Magandang foundation ito bago ka lumipat sa mas advanced na investment products.

response.message: paano maginvest sa iabng product ng BPI
response.translated_message:
Here's the translation:

"How to invest in BPI's investment product"

Or, in a more detailed translation:

"How do I invest in BPI's investment product?"

This translation maintains the original context of the text, which is about investing in a product offered by Bank of the Philippine Islands (BPI).

suggestions.suggestion: Para sa iyong investment journey sa BPI, simulan mo sa BPI Savings Account na may Passbook o ATM. Ayon sa latest requirements, kailangan mo ng initial deposit na P500 at maintaining balance na P3,000. Kapag na-maintain mo ito, automatic kang kikita ng interest na 0.0625% p.a. na binabayaran quarterly. Magandang foundation ito bago ka lumipat sa mas advanced na investment products.

May tatlong magagandang options: 1) BPI Savings Account - P3,000 maintaining balance, may passbook/ATM access; 2) BPI Maxi-Saver Savings - mas mataas na interest rates kung P50,000 ang maintaining balance mo; 3) BPI Dollar Savings - para sa dollar investments, kailangan ng $500 initial deposit at $500 maintaining balance. Tandaan na ang ilang services tulad ng pag-update ng mobile number o pagbukas ng ibang account type ay kailangan pa ring puntahan sa branch kahit may digital banking ka.

Gamit ang BPI Online at Mobile app, makakapag-invest ka na sa mga BPI Investment Funds kahit nasa bahay ka lang. Pwede kang mag-open ng Unit Investment Trust Fund (UITF) o mutual funds online. Para sa time deposits, available din ito sa digital platform. Gayunpaman, kung gusto mong mag-open ng bagong account type (halimbawa, kung may existing credit card ka at gusto ng savings account), kailangan mo pa ring mag-book ng appointment sa branch.

Para sa basic savings account, kailangan mo ng: 2 valid IDs, proof of billing, at P500 initial deposit. Kung employed ka, maghanda ng Certificate of Employment o latest payslip. Kung self-employed, kailangan ng latest Audited Financial Statements at Income Tax Return. Ang mga existing BPI cardholders na principal cardholders for at least one year ay exempted na sa proof of income requirement.
